name: Paddy Power Betfair plc
membership: We work informally with the European Gaming and Betting Association. We are members of the Remote Gambling Association. We are also members of national gambling industry associations in several member states.
goal: Paddy Power Betfair's primary goal is to provide high quality online gambling services to consumers across the world.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Enterprise, Internal Market, Sport
euInitiatives:
- Online gambling initiatives/legislation.
- Anti-money laundering directive
- Match-fixing and sports rights initiatives
